text: Mukanibwa okhuteshia banyinenywe, Abana benyu (beshikhana), abakhana benyu, basenje benyu, abakhana babu mama wenyu, Omwana womusiani wenyu, nende Omwana womukhana wenyu, nende bamama benyu babanunia nende abakhana benyu khukhununa, nende Abana babakhasi benyu bali hasi wobulindi bwenyu abebulwa nende abakhasi benyu bamwamala okhubenjilila. Ne nimushili okhubenjilila awo eshikhukaila shibulao. Nemukanibwa khandi abakhasi babaana benyu abarula khutsingongofuma tsienyu. Nende okhuteshia Abana bomunzu ndala halali mulala wabu nafwile. Toto Nyasaye niwobulesheli muno Owetsimbabaasi po
